item.title: Trump-Kennedy Center Sees More Cancellations After Name Change
item.description: Two more acts have canceled upcoming events at the Donald J. Trump and John F. Kennedy Memorial Center for the Performing Arts.

item.title: Sen. Markwayne Mullin to Newsmax: 'They All Voted to Tax You'
item.description: Sen. Markwayne Mullin, R-Okla., told Newsmax on Monday that Democrats do not want Americans to reap the benefits of President Donald Trump's tax cuts.
